item.title: SDS and mental health
item.description:
Who is it for? 
The content and methods to deliver SDS learning and development is for SDS leads, mental health team leaders and service managers, learning and development professionals.
What does it do? 

The document provides content and methods for SDS learning and development for mental health practitioners, people eligible for self-directed support due to their mental health problems, family carers, support workers and independent advocates.

How can you use it? 
The content and methods to deliver SDS learning and development can be used as a set of recommendations for how to design and deliver SDS learning and development for mental health practitioners and others.

item.title: SDS and risk and capacity
item.description:
Who is it for? 
The learning and development course outline on SDS and risk and capacity is for SDS leads, adult protection leads, and learning and development professionals.
What does it do? 

The learning and development course outline is a design brief for joint learning and development on SDS and risk and capacity.

How can you use it? 
The learning and development course outline can be used as a set of recommendations for how a local authority could design and deliver learning and development for practitioners and others.
